speaker: Scott Donohoo
title: Scaling your AI/ML practices with MLOps and Azure Machine Learning | Part 3
description:
On Part 3 of Scaling your AI/ML practices with MLOps and Azure Machine Learning, Scott Donohoo demos how to use the Azure MLOps Solution Accelerator to securely train, deploy and manage ML models in production environments.  

Chapters:
00:00 AI Show begins
00:19 Welcome and Intros
01:23 Review of Parts 1 and 2
01:58 Azure MLOps (v2) Solution Accelerator overview
02:46 Demo
13:05 Get Started https://github.com/Azure/mlops-v2
14:11 Wrap 

Resources:
Learning Modules to upskill your MLOps practices https://aka.ms/MLOps/Learn
MLOps Maturity Model to evaluate MLOps adoption and take an incremental approach to MLOps adoption https://aka.ms/MLOps/MaturityModel
MLOps Solution Accelerator to bootstrap MLOps environments https://github.com/Azure/mlops-v2
Setup MLOps in Microsoft Docs https://aka.ms/MLOps/Setup
